httpdocs
Table of Contents

PostSubscriptionSchedulesSchedule

Updates an existing subscription schedule.

HTTP Request

POST \v1\subscription_schedules\{schedule} HTTP/1.1

host: api.stripe.com:443
eTag: "23423432"
accept: application/json
content-type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded


{ "example": "Example goes here" }

Parameters

schedule [ in: path type: string ]
required

Request Body Schema

{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "default_settings": {
      "title": "default_settings_params",
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "application_fee_percent": {
          "type": "number"
        },
        "automatic_tax": {
          "title": "automatic_tax_config",
          "required": [
            "enabled"
          ],
          "type": "object",
          "properties": {
            "enabled": {
              "type": "boolean"
            }
          }
        },
        "billing_cycle_anchor": {
          "enum": [
            "automatic",
            "phase_start"
          ],
          "type": "string"
        },
        "billing_thresholds": {
          "anyOf": [
            {
              "title": "billing_thresholds_param",
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "amount_gte": {
                  "type": "integer"
                },
                "reset_billing_cycle_anchor": {
                  "type": "boolean"

              }
            },
            {
              "enum": [
                ""

              "type": "string"

          ]

          "enum": [
            "charge_automatically",
            "send_invoice"
          ],
          "type": "string"
        },

          "maxLength": 5000,
          "type": "string"
        },
        "description": {
          "maxLength": 500,
          "type": "string"
        },
        "invoice_settings": {
          "title": "subscription_schedules_param",
          "type": "object",

            "days_until_due": {
              "type": "integer"

    },

      "enum": [
        "cancel",
        "none",
        "release",
        "renew"
      ],
      "type": "string",
      "description": "Behavior of the subscription schedule and underlying subscription when it ends. Possible values are release or cancel with the default being release. release will end the subscription schedule and keep the underlying subscription running.cancel will end the subscription schedule and cancel the underlying subscription."
    },
    "expand": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "maxLength": 5000,
        "type": "string"
      },

          "type": "string"

    },
    "phases": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "title": "phase_configuration_params",

          "items"

        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "add_invoice_items": {
            "type": "array",

              "title": "add_invoice_item_entry",
              "type": "object",
              "properties": {
                "price": {

              {
                "type": "integer"

                "enum": [
                  "now"
                ],
                "type": "string"
              }
            ]
          }
        }
      },
      "description": "List representing phases of the subscription schedule. Each phase can be customized to have different durations, plans, and coupons. If there are multiple phases, the end_date of one phase will always equal the start_date of the next phase. Note that past phases can be omitted."
    },
    "proration_behavior": {
      "enum": [
        "always_invoice",
        "create_prorations",
        "none"
      ],
      "type": "string",
      "description": "If the update changes the current phase, indicates whether the changes should be prorated. The default value is create_prorations."
    }
  },
  "additionalProperties": false
}

Responses

  • 200 Successful response.
  • default Error response.
